DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study Evaluate Immunopotentiating Effects Immulina Elderly Individuals
DOC.criteria: Age 60 older ; Generally otherwise healthy age take medications/supplements could expect affect stress response and/or impact immune parameter ( example systemic steroid , beta blocker , antidepressant , antianxiety drug , Echinacea supplement , ginseng supplement Spirulina supplement ) . Inability comprehend speak English ; Any history major psychological psychiatric illness ( example dementia , psychotic disorder , acute mania , current substance abuse ) may limit participant cooperation compromise integrity selfreported clinical psychological data ; Presence confound underlying systemic illness could interfere immunological profile ( example severe cardiovascular , pulmonary , hepatic , gastrointestinal , renal , neurological , musculoskeletal endocrine , metabolic system ; gross physical impairment ; history significant convulsive disorder ) . Specifically , patient congestive heart failure , recent viral bacterial illness past 3 week , chronic kidney disease , thyroid disorder , autoimmune disease exclude .
